article.title: Strategies for Change in Information Programs
article.author: Hug, W.E.
article.text: The diverse energies framing library-media-information futures affect everyone who needs to know, to understand, to do, and to grow. This collection of articles and essays represents the many concerns and insights that are helping shape the future, a future in which library-media-information programs can play a vital role as they attempt to reach out to people everywhere.
